column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The food was seriously AMAZING. We started off with the shrimp and this by far was the best shrimp I have ever had. It was served with a bold garlic sauce and bread. That could have been an entree on its own. Following
column6: and truffle mac n cheese. Everything literally had us humming. The food was something we have never tasted before very bold in flavor
column8: and cooked to perfection. The portions were also huge. We had tons of leftovers which warmed up great the next day! I cannot wait to get back here! From the attentive service to the absolute amazing food I highly recommend.
